## TypeMembersMap.getAsKind() method

A typed call to `this.get()` for a given kind.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAsKind<Kind extends NamedTypeMemberImpl["kind"]>(kind: Kind, name: string): Extract<TypeMemberImpl, KindedStructure<Kind>> | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  kind | Kind | the structure kind. |
|  name | string | the key to get. |

**Returns:**

Extract&lt;[TypeMemberImpl](./ts-morph-structures.typememberimpl.md)<!-- -->, KindedStructure&lt;Kind&gt;&gt; \| undefined

- the type member, as the right type, or undefined if the wrong type.
